item.description:
Let's show Connecticut the massive support that Ron Paul has in the Constitution State!

Huckabee supporters, who will also be at the Straw Poll on January 25th, will be staging a rally to hand out their literature. If they get media, it is good to try to score in on it for Ron Paul too.

If we make a good showing, then it will show that Ron Paul is a better choice for New England, because he has more support here, and that he has a much better chance to win in November.
item.how_to_find_us: "Look for the signs. We will be meeting around the Carousel in the park." --Andrew Rule, Bryan Tracy, and perrell
item.why: This will be a fun event to show support for Ron Paul. A simultaneous Mike Huckabee Rally is planned there as well.
item.name: Ron Paul Rally at Bushnell Park
